features: Moisturizing+ Formula - Newly formulated with 9 powerful moisturizing, and vitamins-rich agents that dramatically improves your intimate shaving experience; Jojoba Oil / Avocado Oil / Aloe Vera / Shea Butter / Maca Root / Coconut Oil / Squalane / Guarana Seed Extract / Vitamin E.
With the strengths of Moisturizing+ agents, Coochy Plus Intimate Shave Cream is developed based on the most-trusted intimate shave cream formula. Safe for most skin types. Made in USA.

Initmate & Universal - Because Coochy Plus is formulated for the most intimate areas of the body, it can also be safely used on any other parts of the body. Helps soften the most coarse and textured body hair, such as pubic hair or underarm hair.

Intimate Guard - To prevent razor bumps, in-grown hairs, razor burn, or rash caused by traditional shaving products, Moisturizing+ agents softens the hair, and forms an invisible shield on your skin to deliver close shaves that do not leave marks or damage your intimate skin.
body.description: YOU are unique So should your shaving cream. Brown or deeper skin tones are beautiful and unique but many face a specific set of challenges such as ingrown hairs, uneven skin tone, darkening of skin as a result of dehydration. Featuring HydroLock, clinically formulated consonance of plant-derived squalene, Vitamin E, and refined coconut oil extra, that fortifies your intimate skin for maximum moisture retention and prevents moisture loss. Enhanced radiance, suppleness, and comfort of your sensitive skins is not just reachable, but only a shave away. Nourishes damaged intimate skin from abrasion resulted from shaving to accelerate cell repair and regeneration. Fast-acting blend of MOISTURIZING+ and HydroLock formulations dramatically reduce and calm irritations such as razor burn, razor bump, in-grown hair, itchiness, and over drying.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Trusted for Over 30 Years Coochy, a brand synonymous with the best intimate shave cream for over 30 years, is proud to introduce the latest advancement in both shaving and sensual experience. Coochy Plus is a luxury Intimate Shaving Cream that will ensure a superior shaving experience. Formulated specifically for natural texture hair and intimate skin and to dramatically reduce ingrown hair, razor burn, razor bump, itchiness and other irritations. The SWEET DIVA is also infused with HydroLock, a complex of plant-derived squalene, Vitamin E, and pure coconut oil extract that encourages moisture retention to enhance radiance, suppleness, and comfort of your sensitive and intimate skins.

Intimate Care, Made Personal. At IntiMD, our business is not simply to innovate and offer intimate care products; but to initiate and continue the dialogue of the importance of intimate care. We are committed to providing reliable information and products that are true to user experience to our customers while keeping the conversation about male and female intimate care on-going, which creates the perfect platform for dialogue. YOU are unique So should your shaving cream. Brown or deeper skin tones are beautiful and unique but many face a specific set of challenges such as ingrown hairs, uneven skin tone, darkening of skin as a result of dehydration. Featuring HydroLock, clinically formulated consonance of plant-derived squalene, Vitamin E, and refined coconut oil extra, that fortifies your intimate skin for maximum moisture retention and prevents moisture loss. Enhanced radiance, suppleness, and comfort of your sensitive skins is not just reachable, but only a shave away. Nourishes damaged intimate skin from abrasion resulted from shaving to accelerate cell repair and regeneration. Fast-acting blend of MOISTURIZING+ and HydroLock formulations dramatically reduce and calm irritations such as razor burn, razor bump, in-grown hair, itchiness, and over drying.

HydroLock Instant Hydration & Moisture Retention Featuring HydroLock, clinically formulated consonance of plant-derived squalene, Vitamin E, and refined coconut oil extract, that fortifies your intimate skin for maximum moisture retention and prevents moisture loss. Enhanced radiance, suppleness, and comfort of your sensitive and intimate skins is not just reachable, but only a shave away.

MOISTURIZING+ Our patent-pending formula, an intricate balance of five powerful moisturizing, and vitamin-rich agents, are proven to dramatically reduce and calm common shaving irritations such as razor burn, razor bump, in-grown hair, itchiness, and over-drying. Discover a way to hair-free skin which is free from unsightly bumps and uncomfortable ingrown hairs.

CLINICALLY & REAL-WORLD PROVEN Don't take our word for it, trust the 30+ years of track records. COOCHY PLUS has been developed and improved based on the most effective, trusted, and proven intimate shave cream formula. Customers have relied on COOCHY PLUS for over 30 years because it is proven to be safe for all skin types. Skin is left free of razor bumps, ingrown hairs, razor burn or rashes, and is soft, smooth and moisturized. The patent-pending formula helps to soften even the most coarse body hair, such as pubic hair and underarm hair. Enjoy a closer shave thanks to the protective barrier COOCHY PLUS forms on your skin. This invisible shield ensures skin suffers no marks or damage from the razor.

Uniquely You You are unique, so should your intimate shaving cream. Clinically formulated for deeper skin tones for instant hydration and continuous moisture retention. Plant Based The squalene incorporated is derived from plant; unlike others which are often sourced from shark livers. Making Coochy Plus the perfect choice. pH Balanced Balanced perfectly (pH between 3.8 to 4.5) for your intimate area. Proven to improve intimate hygiene, prevent and eliminate odor.

NOURIA Pre-Shave Elixir Oil by Coochy Plus 1oz IntiMD Coochy Plus Shave Cream Fragrance Free 8oz Tube IntiMD Coochy Plus Shave Cream Citrus Elixir 8.5oz Pump IntiMD Coochy Plus Shave Cream Coco Allure 8.5oz Pump IntiMD Coochy Plus Shave Cream The Origin 8.5oz Pump IntiMD Coochy Plus After Shave Protection Mist 4oz Dermatologist Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ MOISTURIZING+ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dispenser Dropper Squeeze Tube Pump Pump Pump Sprayer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw this on a video and was like I need to try this. So I ordered it & I used it yesterday and I am so glad that I ordered it. It leaves my skin so soft and smooth it’s unbelievable! I will definitely be ordering again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells AMAZINGLY GOOD
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed was the nicest smell of any shower product that I've ever owned. It seriously gives you razor burn free skin. It leaves you moisturized and nourished. I've never had such an effective shaving cream previously. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Realmente es bueno para pieles sensibles y vellos rizos como el mío. Me gusta esta marca si me dan a escoger entre la variedad escojo esta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disclaimer. I am white.
reviews.reviewText: But I have thick hair so I wanted to give this a go.This formula is awesome. It is silkier than the original and has some awesome glide to it. It works great. Better than the original.What’s my issue?The smell.It smells like cheap axe body spray for men. It’s so perfumey but smells like men’s cologne and it’s STRONG. I can’t stand the smell.They need to make this in other scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only used once so far
reviews.reviewText: so far so good as far as a shaving cream goes. no razor burn so thats good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth like butter
reviews.reviewText: OMG when I tell you this shaving cream left me with a soft smooth shave, I am not lying. I love this shaving cream and I hate I had not checked on it sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smells wonderful and works just as amazing. No ingrown hairs or razor burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell and this is the only product I use to shave
